articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Nigeria rejects US military threat over alleged Christian killings - Politico
articles.description: The African nation denied that Christians are being persecuted.
articles.content:
Here is what to know about the issue:
Trumps guns blazing threat: Trump on Saturday doubled down on his allegations that the government is failing to rein in the persecution of Christians in the Wes… [+3637 chars]
